name: CommonSourceSet
purpose: Contains shared Kotlin code that runs on both Android and iOS platforms, representing the core functionality of the Mixed Wash application.

change_log.summary: Updated state file with current commit hash
Updated state file with current commit hash
Enhanced state file schema and updated cross-feature component documentation

architecture.description: The project follows Clean Architecture principles with data, domain, and presentation layers across all features.

layers.name: Data
layers.description: Contains repositories, data sources, and models for API and local storage

layers.name: Domain
layers.description: Contains use cases, business logic, and domain models

layers.name: Presentation
layers.description: Contains ViewModels, UI state, and Composable UI components

components.name: Core
components.purpose: Contains fundamental components and utilities used across the application

components.name: Features
components.purpose: Contains feature-specific implementations organized in feature modules

components.name: UI and Theme
components.purpose: Contains themes, colors, typography, and other style resources

components.name: App.kt
components.purpose: Main entry point that sets up the application's theme, navigation, and state management

crossFeatureComponents.name: AddressList
crossFeatureComponents.purpose: Displays the list of saved addresses with options to edit or delete

crossFeatureComponents.name: AddressSearch
crossFeatureComponents.purpose: Allows users to search for addresses

crossFeatureComponents.name: AddressBottomSheetState
crossFeatureComponents.purpose: State container for address bottom sheet in the home screen

dependencies.name: Jetpack Compose
dependencies.purpose: UI framework for building native UIs

dependencies.name: Firebase
dependencies.purpose: Backend services including authentication and Firestore
